detail_desc: Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with buttons at the back of the neck and a longer layer in woven fabric at the hem.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with buttons at the back of the neck and a rounded collar in woven fabric. Longer layer in woven fabric at the hem.
Cropped, fitted sports vest top in stretch jersey with a round neckline and racer back.
Court shoes with pointed toes, leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 10 cm.
Top in jersey crêpe with short, scallop-edged sleeves and a cut-out pattern and scalloped edge at the hem.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist that is elasticated at the back. Fake welt back pockets and slim legs with creases.
Joggers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated waist, worn details and a zip fly and button. Side pockets, back pockets and tapered legs with decorative seams and elasticated hems.

Blouse in a viscose weave with a button placket and a lace yoke at the front. Long sleeves with gathered seams at the shoulders and narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the jacket is organic.
Gilet in soft pile with a zip down the front, hood with an elasticated drawstring, zipped chest pocket and zipped side pockets. Fleece lining.
Protective plastic case with a lid for AirPods.
Slip-on trainers in cotton twill with elastic gores in the sides and heels that can be folded down half way. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch cotton denim. Loose fit with a high waist, button fly and cut-off, raw-edge hems. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Short, V-neck dress in cotton jersey with covered buttons down the front and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Block-coloured top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a text motif. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in sturdy washed denim with worn details, embroidery, a regular waist and straight legs.
T-shirts in soft viscose jersey with a deep neckline and rounded hem.
Fully-fashioned trainers with details in imitation leather. Elasticated top edge, a loop front and back, and elasticated lacing with a drawstring at the top. Mesh insoles and patterned soles.
Fitted vest top in soft jersey.
Shorts in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with covered elastication, a small frill trim and a decorative, sewn-on bow at the waist.
Shaftless socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets, and an adjustable tab with buttons at the sides. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Elastic bracelets with small, round wooden beads.
Hipster briefs in microfibre and mesh with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Short jersey dress with narrow shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt.
Cable-knit jumper in a cotton blend. Wrapover hood with a decorative drawstring, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fully lined swimsuit with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support.
Ankle boots in leather with pointed toes, covered heels and a zip at the back. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 8 cm.

Padded outdoor trousers in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with a zip fly and hook and loop fastening, elasticated hems and an elastic strap under the feet. The trousers are in a slightly higher cut at the back with elastication at the waist and have elastic braces with a hook and loop fastening. Reflective details and a fleece lining. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Cropped top in light, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Raw-edge hem. Lightly brushed inside.
Slip-on trainers in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Jersey linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Slim-fit joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and stripes down the sides of the legs.
Pull-on trousers in soft, organic cotton corduroy with an elasticated waist, fake fly, side pockets and an open back pocket.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a cotton blend.
Cap in woven fabric with a motif on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Round-necked T-shirt in premium cotton jersey.
Balconette bra in lace with lightly padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Blouse in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Long puff sleeves with smocking at the elbows and buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Padded, fitted jacket in woven fabric with a lined hood and stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and fleece-lined front pockets with a press-stud. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in thin, printed cotton jersey with ribbed cuffs.

Kangol x H&M. Waist bag in soft faux shearling with the Kangol logo on the front. Zip at the top with a fabric tab and an adjustable, jacquard-weave waist strap with a plastic fastener. Height 19 cm. Width 29 cm.
Short, pleated skirt in a patterned weave with a high waist with covered elastication. Rounded hem that is shorter at the sides. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif, press-studs on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating mesh sections at the crotch, back and sides. Elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist and zipped side pockets.
Short swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with buttons at the top, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. One of the tops has an open chest pocket.
Nylon windbreaker with a detachable hood, stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets. Narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Fleece lining.
Short, multi-strand necklace with plastic beads. Adjustable length 47-56 cm.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit. Turn-up at the hem with embroidered text on the front.
Short, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, welt front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Trousers in woven fabric. Relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs with turn-ups.
Long cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders and patch front pockets. No buttons. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Long, fitted jersey top with narrow adjustable shoulder straps.
Bikini briefs in mesh with lace details, a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy jersey with a low-cut back, seam at the waist and flared skirt. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
V-neck top in woven fabric with an opening and button at the back and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Unlined.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, printed cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and a flared skirt.

Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the sweatshirt is organic. The polyester content is partly recycled.
Ankle-length trousers in stretch twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Padded jacket in nylon with a detachable hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Scarf in soft, rib-knit cashmere. Size 35x170 cm.

Fully lined shaping swimsuit that has a sculpting effect on the tummy, back and bum. Wrapover top, lightly padded cups, support panels, decorative gathers in the sides, and adjustable shoulder straps.

prod_name: FUNC. SB Rain jkt fleece lined
detail_desc: Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams and reflective details. Stand-up collar, detachable hood and press-studs down the front with a wind flap and hook and loop fastening. Elastication at the cuffs and hem. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly and adjustable belt. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a round neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Waterproof hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing at the front and a hook and loop tab at the top. Loop at the front and back and chunky, patterned soles. Height of soles 2.3 cm.
Scarf in a soft loose weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 80x200 cm.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot and a loop at the back. Satin linings and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Short skirt in woven fabric with visible seams at the front, a high waist with decorative buttons at the top, and a visible zip at the back. Side pockets with a press-stud. Unlined.
Fine-knit jumper in a modal and cotton blend with a ribbed turtle neck and long sleeves.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft silk and cotton blend with a ribbed collar, button placket and long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Suit trousers in a stretch, checked weave with an extended waistband with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Short off-the-shoulder top in a textured chiffon weave with narrow elastication and double flounces at the top. Narrow, decorative shoulder straps and short flounced sleeves.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Bracelets of metal and braided cord decorated with beads. Adjustable length.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless dress in patterned tulle with an opening and pearly button at the back of the neck. Gathered seam at the waist and hem with tiers to create width in the skirt. Satin lining.
Straight-cut top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
